scripts.success-pre-commit: echo "ESLint - Hey, great job! No syntax errors today! Ready to be commited."
scripts.success-pre-push: echo "ESLint - Hey, great job! No syntax errors today! Ready to be pushed!"
scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/nightwatch tests/visual-tests/calc-test.js && echo "Nightwatch tests passed.." && jest && echo "Jest tests passed.."

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run success-pre-commit
hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run success-pre-push
